name: Mushroom Exterminator (WIP)
description:
The year is 2537, inter-galactic space mushrooms, called the Musht Tribe, have came to your decaying planet. Slowly they try to decompose your world. You must reunite with your crew and cleanse your world of the Musht Tribe. 

The Roadmap is for once this game goes into its main portion of development, May 6th.
